__prompts__.description: Enter a brief description of your project
__prompts__.author: Enter your name (author of the project)
__prompts__.production_domain: Enter the production domain (e.g., https://example.com) used for CORS
__prompts__.use_sentry: Do you want to enable Sentry for error tracking?
__prompts__.sentry_dsn: Enter your Sentry DSN (leave empty if not using Sentry)
